```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
ces<-read.csv(here("data","ces3demographics.csv")) %>%  #read in the dataset
  clean_names()

```

```{r}
# Create ggplot of %white vs CES3.0
ggplot(data = ces,
       aes(x = white, y = ces_3_0_score))+
  geom_point()
```
